H0.text: The nucleus contains positive protons and neutral neutrons.

H1.text: Electrons contain positive protons and neutral neutrons.

H2.text: Ions contain positive protons and neutral neutrons.

H3.text: Epidermis contains positive protons and neutral neutrons.

A4.text: Neutrons are electrically neutral, but contribute to the mass of a nucleus to nearly the same extent as the protons.

A5.text: The proton has an approximately exponentially decaying positive charge distribution with a mean square radius of about 0.8 fm.
